mn95:1.2_0: ekaṁ samayaṁ bhagavā kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ yena opāsādaṁ nāma kosalānaṁ brāhmaṇagāmo tadavasari.
mn95:1.3_0: Tatra sudaṁ bhagavā opāsāde viharati uttarena opāsādaṁ devavane sālavane.
mn95:2.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena caṅkī brāhmaṇo opāsādaṁ ajjhāvasati sattussadaṁ satiṇakaṭṭhodakaṁ sadhaññaṁ rājabhoggaṁ
mn95:2.1_1: raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṁ rājadāyaṁ brahmadeyyaṁ.
mn95:3.2_1: gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ opāsādaṁ anuppatto,
mn95:3.2_2: opāsāde viharati uttarena opāsādaṁ devavane sālavane.
mn95:3.3_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn95:3.4_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
mn95:3.5_0: So imaṁ lokaṁ sadevakaṁ samārakaṁ sabrahmakaṁ sassamaṇabrāhmaṇiṁ pajaṁ sadevamanussaṁ sayaṁ abhiññā sacchikatvā pavedeti.
mn95:3.6_0: So dhammaṁ deseti ādikalyāṇaṁ majjhekalyāṇaṁ pariyosānakalyāṇaṁ sātthaṁ sabyañjanaṁ,
mn95:3.7_0: Sādhu kho pana tathārūpānaṁ arahataṁ dassanaṁ hotī”ti.
mn95:4.1_0: Atha kho opāsādakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā opāsādā nikkhamitvā saṅghasaṅghī gaṇībhūtā uttarenamukhā gacchanti yena devavanaṁ sālavanaṁ.
mn95:5.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena caṅkī brāhmaṇo uparipāsāde divāseyyaṁ upagato.
mn95:5.2_0: Addasā kho caṅkī brāhmaṇo opāsādake brāhmaṇagahapatike opāsādā nikkhamitvā saṅghasaṅghī gaṇībhūte uttarenamukhaṁ
mn95:5.4_2: opāsādakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā opāsādā nikkhamitvā saṅghasaṅghī gaṇībhūtā uttarenamukhā gacchanti yena devavanaṁ sālavanan”ti?
mn95:6.1_2: samaṇo gotamo sakyaputto sakyakulā pabbajito kosalesu cārikaṁ caramāno mahatā bhikkhusaṅghena saddhiṁ opāsādaṁ anuppatto,
mn95:6.1_3: opāsāde viharati uttarena opāsādaṁ devavane sālavane.
mn95:6.2_0: Taṁ kho pana bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn95:6.3_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti.
mn95:6.7_0: āgamentu kira bhonto, caṅkīpi brāhmaṇo samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissatī’”ti.
mn95:6.8_1: bho”ti kho so khatto caṅkissa brāhmaṇassa paṭissutvā yena opāsādakā brāhmaṇagahapatikā tenupasaṅkami;
mn95:6.10_0: ‘āgamentu kira bhonto, caṅkīpi brāhmaṇo samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissatī’”ti.
mn95:7.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena nānāverajjakānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ pañcamattāni brāhmaṇasatāni opāsāde paṭivasanti kenacideva karaṇīyena.
mn95:7.3_0: “caṅkī kira brāhmaṇo samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissatī”ti.
mn95:7.4_0: Atha kho te brāhmaṇā yena caṅkī brāhmaṇo tenupasaṅkamiṁsu;
mn95:7.5_0: “saccaṁ kira bhavaṁ caṅkī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissatī”ti?
mn95:8.1_0: “Mā bhavaṁ caṅkī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkami.
mn95:8.2_0: Na arahati bhavaṁ caṅkī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:8.3_0: samaṇotveva gotamo arahati bhavantaṁ caṅkiṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
mn95:8.4_0: Bhavañhi caṅkī ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṁsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
mn95:8.5_0: Yampi bhavaṁ caṅkī ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṁsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena,
mn95:8.5_1: imināpaṅgena na arahati bhavaṁ caṅkī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:8.6_0: samaṇotveva gotamo arahati bhavantaṁ caṅkiṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
mn95:8.8_0: bhavañhi caṅkī tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ, padako,
mn95:8.9_0: bhavañhi caṅkī abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato brahmavaṇṇī brahmavacchasī akhuddāvakāso dassanāya …pe…
mn95:8.10_0: bhavañhi caṅkī sīlavā vuddhasīlī vuddhasīlena samannāgato …pe…
mn95:8.11_0: bhavañhi caṅkī kalyāṇavāco kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā …pe…
mn95:8.12_0: bhavañhi caṅkī bahūnaṁ ācariyapācariyo, tīṇi māṇavakasatāni mante vāceti …pe…
mn95:8.13_0: bhavañhi caṅkī rañño pasenadissa kosalassa sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito …pe…
mn95:8.14_0: bhavañhi caṅkī brāhmaṇassa pokkharasātissa sakkato garukato mānito pūjito apacito …pe…
mn95:8.15_0: bhavañhi caṅkī opāsādaṁ ajjhāvasati sattussadaṁ satiṇakaṭṭhodakaṁ sadhaññaṁ rājabhoggaṁ raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṁ rājadāyaṁ brahmadeyyaṁ.
mn95:8.16_0: Yampi bhavaṁ caṅkī opāsādaṁ ajjhāvasati sattussadaṁ satiṇakaṭṭhodakaṁ sadhaññaṁ rājabhoggaṁ raññā pasenadinā kosalena dinnaṁ rājadāyaṁ brahmadeyyaṁ,
mn95:8.16_1: imināpaṅgena na arahati bhavaṁ caṅkī samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:8.17_0: samaṇotveva gotamo arahati bhavantaṁ caṅkiṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamitun”ti.
mn95:9.1_0: Evaṁ vutte, caṅkī brāhmaṇo te brāhmaṇe etadavoca:
mn95:9.2_0: “tena hi, bho, mamapi suṇātha, yathā mayameva arahāma taṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:9.3_0: na tveva arahati so bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
mn95:9.4_1: gotamo ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṁsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena.
mn95:9.5_1: samaṇo gotamo ubhato sujāto mātito ca pitito ca saṁsuddhagahaṇiko yāva sattamā pitāmahayugā akkhitto anupakkuṭṭho jātivādena,
mn95:9.5_2: imināpaṅgena na arahati so bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:9.6_0: atha kho mayameva arahāma taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
mn95:9.7_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo pahūtaṁ hiraññasuvaṇṇaṁ ohāya pabbajito bhūmigatañca vehāsaṭṭhañca …pe…
mn95:9.8_1: gotamo daharova samāno yuvā susukāḷakeso bhadrena yobbanena samannāgato paṭhamena vayasā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito …pe…
mn95:9.9_1: gotamo akāmakānaṁ mātāpitūnaṁ assumukhānaṁ rudantānaṁ kesamassuṁ ohāretvā kāsāyāni vatthāni acchādetvā agārasmā anagāriyaṁ pabbajito …pe…
mn95:9.10_1: gotamo abhirūpo dassanīyo pāsādiko paramāya vaṇṇapokkharatāya samannāgato brahmavaṇṇī brahmavacchasī akhuddāvakāso dassanāya …pe…
mn95:9.11_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo sīlavā ariyasīlī kusalasīlī kusalena sīlena samannāgato …pe…
mn95:9.12_1: gotamo kalyāṇavāco kalyāṇavākkaraṇo poriyā vācāya samannāgato vissaṭṭhāya anelagalāya atthassa viññāpaniyā …pe…
mn95:9.13_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo bahūnaṁ ācariyapācariyo …pe…
mn95:9.14_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo khīṇakāmarāgo vigatacāpallo …pe…
mn95:9.15_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo kammavādī kiriyavādī apāpapurekkhāro brahmaññāya pajāya …pe…
mn95:9.16_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo uccā kulā pabbajito asambhinnā khattiyakulā …pe…
mn95:9.17_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo aḍḍhā kulā pabbajito mahaddhanā mahābhogā …pe…
mn95:9.18_0: Samaṇaṁ khalu, bho, gotamaṁ tiroraṭṭhā tirojanapadā saṁpucchituṁ āgacchanti …pe…
mn95:9.19_0: Samaṇaṁ khalu, bho, gotamaṁ anekāni devatāsahassāni pāṇehi saraṇaṁ gatāni …pe…
mn95:9.20_0: Samaṇaṁ khalu, bho, gotamaṁ evaṁ kalyāṇo kittisaddo abbhuggato:
mn95:9.21_0: ‘itipi so bhagavā arahaṁ sammāsambuddho vijjācaraṇasampanno sugato lokavidū anuttaro purisadammasārathi satthā devamanussānaṁ buddho bhagavā’ti …pe…
mn95:9.22_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo dvattiṁsamahāpurisalakkhaṇehi samannāgato …pe…
mn95:9.23_0: Samaṇaṁ khalu, bho, gotamaṁ rājā māgadho seniyo bimbisāro saputtadāro pāṇehi saraṇaṁ gato …pe…
mn95:9.24_0: Samaṇaṁ khalu, bho, gotamaṁ rājā pasenadi kosalo saputtadāro pāṇehi saraṇaṁ gato …pe…
mn95:9.25_0: Samaṇaṁ khalu, bho, gotamaṁ brāhmaṇo pokkharasāti saputtadāro pāṇehi saraṇaṁ gato …pe…
mn95:9.26_0: Samaṇo khalu, bho, gotamo opāsādaṁ anuppatto opāsāde viharati uttarena opāsādaṁ devavane sālavane.
mn95:9.27_0: Ye kho te samaṇā vā brāhmaṇā vā amhākaṁ gāmakkhettaṁ āgacchanti, atithī no te honti.
mn95:9.28_0: Atithī kho panamhehi sakkātabbā garukātabbā mānetabbā pūjetabbā.
mn95:9.29_0: Yampi samaṇo gotamo opāsādaṁ anuppatto opāsāde viharati uttarena opāsādaṁ devavane sālavane,
mn95:9.30_0: Atithi kho panamhehi sakkātabbo garukātabbo mānetabbo pūjetabbo.
mn95:9.31_0: Imināpaṅgena na arahati so bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:9.32_0: atha kho mayameva arahāma taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ.
mn95:9.33_2: no ca kho so bhavaṁ gotamo ettakavaṇṇo;
mn95:9.35_0: Ekamekenapi tena aṅgena samannāgato na arahati, so bhavaṁ gotamo amhākaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamituṁ;
mn95:9.36_0: atha kho mayameva arahāma taṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamitunti.
mn95:9.37_0: Tena hi, bho, sabbeva mayaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ dassanāya upasaṅkamissāmā”ti.
mn95:10.1_0: Atha kho caṅkī brāhmaṇo mahatā brāhmaṇagaṇena saddhiṁ yena bhagavā tenupasaṅkami;
mn95:10.2_0: Sammodanīyaṁ kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā ekamantaṁ nisīdi.
mn95:11.1_0: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā vuddhehi vuddhehi brāhmaṇehi saddhiṁ kiñci kiñci kathaṁ sāraṇīyaṁ vītisāretvā nisinno hoti.
mn95:11.2_0: Tena kho pana samayena kāpaṭiko nāma māṇavo daharo vuttasiro soḷasavassuddesiko jātiyā,
mn95:11.2_1: tiṇṇaṁ vedānaṁ pāragū sanighaṇḍukeṭubhānaṁ sākkharappabhedānaṁ itihāsapañcamānaṁ, padako,
mn95:11.2_3: lokāyatamahāpurisalakkhaṇesu anavayo tassaṁ parisāyaṁ nisinno hoti.
mn95:11.3_0: So vuddhānaṁ vuddhānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ bhagavatā saddhiṁ mantayamānānaṁ antarantarā kathaṁ opāteti.
mn95:11.4_0: Atha kho bhagavā kāpaṭikaṁ māṇavaṁ apasādeti:
mn95:11.5_0: “māyasmā bhāradvājo vuddhānaṁ vuddhānaṁ brāhmaṇānaṁ mantayamānānaṁ antarantarā kathaṁ opātetu.
mn95:11.7_0: Evaṁ vutte, caṅkī brāhmaṇo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn95:11.9_4: pahoti ca kāpaṭiko māṇavo bhotā gotamena saddhiṁ asmiṁ vacane paṭimantetun”ti.
mn95:12.2_0: “addhā kho kāpaṭikassa māṇavassa tevijjake pāvacane kathā bhavissati.
mn95:12.5_0: “yadā me samaṇo gotamo cakkhuṁ upasaṁharissati, athāhaṁ samaṇaṁ gotamaṁ pañhaṁ pucchissāmī”ti.
mn95:12.6_0: Atha kho bhagavā kāpaṭikassa māṇavassa cetasā cetoparivitakkamaññāya yena kāpaṭiko māṇavo tena cakkhūni upasaṁhāsi.
mn95:12.10_0: Atha kho kāpaṭiko māṇavo bhagavantaṁ etadavoca:
mn95:12.11_3: tattha ca brāhmaṇā ekaṁsena niṭṭhaṁ gacchanti:
mn95:13.1_0: “Kiṁ pana, bhāradvāja, atthi koci brāhmaṇānaṁ ekabrāhmaṇopi yo evamāha:
mn95:13.9_2: yepi te brāhmaṇānaṁ pubbakā isayo mantānaṁ kattāro mantānaṁ pavattāro yesamidaṁ etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇaṁ
mn95:13.9_3: mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samihitaṁ tadanugāyanti tadanubhāsanti bhāsitamanubhāsanti vācitamanuvācenti
mn95:13.9_4: seyyathidaṁ—aṭṭhako vāmako vāmadevo vessāmitto yamataggi aṅgīraso bhāradvājo vāseṭṭho kassapo bhagu,
mn95:13.14_0: “Iti kira, bhāradvāja, natthi koci brāhmaṇānaṁ ekabrāhmaṇopi yo evamāha:
mn95:13.20_0: yepi te brāhmaṇānaṁ pubbakā isayo mantānaṁ kattāro mantānaṁ pavattāro yesamidaṁ etarahi brāhmaṇā porāṇaṁ
mn95:13.20_1: mantapadaṁ gītaṁ pavuttaṁ samihitaṁ tadanugāyanti tadanubhāsanti bhāsitamanubhāsanti vācitamanuvācenti
mn95:13.20_2: seyyathidaṁ—aṭṭhako vāmako vāmadevo vessāmitto yamataggi aṅgīraso bhāradvājo vāseṭṭho kassapo bhagu,
mn95:13.23_2: andhaveṇi paramparāsaṁsattā purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na passati;
mn95:13.24_2: andhaveṇūpamaṁ maññe brāhmaṇānaṁ bhāsitaṁ sampajjati—purimopi na passati majjhimopi na passati pacchimopi na passati.
mn95:13.26_0: nanu evaṁ sante brāhmaṇānaṁ amūlikā saddhā sampajjatī”ti?
mn95:14.2_0: “Pubbeva kho tvaṁ, bhāradvāja, saddhaṁ agamāsi, anussavaṁ idāni vadesi.
mn95:14.3_0: Pañca kho ime, bhāradvāja, dhammā diṭṭheva dhamme dvedhā vipākā.
mn95:14.6_0: ime kho, bhāradvāja, pañca dhammā diṭṭheva dhamme dvedhā vipākā.
mn95:14.7_0: Api ca, bhāradvāja, susaddahitaṁyeva hoti, tañca hoti rittaṁ tucchaṁ musā;
mn95:14.8_0: no cepi susaddahitaṁ hoti, tañca hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anaññathā.
mn95:14.12_0: sunijjhāyitaṁyeva hoti, tañca hoti rittaṁ tucchaṁ musā;
mn95:14.13_0: no cepi sunijjhāyitaṁ hoti, tañca hoti bhūtaṁ tacchaṁ anaññathā.
mn95:14.14_0: Saccamanurakkhatā, bhāradvāja, viññunā purisena nālamettha ekaṁsena niṭṭhaṁ gantuṁ:
mn95:15.1_0: “Kittāvatā pana, bho gotama, saccānurakkhaṇā hoti, kittāvatā saccamanurakkhati?
mn95:15.5_0: iti vadaṁ saccamanurakkhati, na tveva tāva ekaṁsena niṭṭhaṁ gacchati:
mn95:15.12_0: iti vadaṁ saccamanurakkhati, na tveva tāva ekaṁsena niṭṭhaṁ gacchati:
mn95:16.2_0: Kittāvatā pana, bho gotama, saccānubodho hoti, kittāvatā saccamanubujjhati?
mn95:17.1_0: “Idha, bhāradvāja, bhikkhu aññataraṁ gāmaṁ vā nigamaṁ vā upanissāya viharati.
mn95:17.2_0: Tamenaṁ gahapati vā gahapatiputto vā upasaṅkamitvā tīsu dhammesu samannesati—
mn95:17.3_0: lobhanīyesu dhammesu, dosanīyesu dhammesu, mohanīyesu dhammesu.
mn95:17.4_0: Atthi nu kho imassāyasmato tathārūpā lobhanīyā dhammā yathārūpehi lobhanīyehi dhammehi pariyādinnacitto ajānaṁ vā vadeyya—
mn95:17.6_0: passāmīti, paraṁ vā tadatthāya samādapeyya yaṁ paresaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti?
mn95:17.8_0: ‘natthi kho imassāyasmato tathārūpā lobhanīyā dhammā yathārūpehi lobhanīyehi dhammehi pariyādinnacitto ajānaṁ vā vadeyya—
mn95:17.10_0: passāmīti, paraṁ vā tadatthāya samādapeyya yaṁ paresaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
mn95:17.11_0: Tathārūpo kho panimassāyasmato kāyasamācāro tathārūpo vacīsamācāro yathā taṁ aluddhassa.
mn95:17.12_0: Yaṁ kho pana ayamāyasmā dhammaṁ deseti,
mn95:17.12_1: gambhīro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo;
mn95:18.1_0: Yato naṁ samannesamāno visuddhaṁ lobhanīyehi dhammehi samanupassati tato naṁ uttari samannesati dosanīyesu dhammesu.
mn95:18.2_0: Atthi nu kho imassāyasmato tathārūpā dosanīyā dhammā yathārūpehi dosanīyehi dhammehi pariyādinnacitto ajānaṁ vā vadeyya—
mn95:18.4_0: passāmīti, paraṁ vā tadatthāya samādapeyya yaṁ paresaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti?
mn95:18.6_0: ‘natthi kho imassāyasmato tathārūpā dosanīyā dhammā yathārūpehi dosanīyehi dhammehi pariyādinnacitto ajānaṁ vā vadeyya—
mn95:18.8_0: passāmīti, paraṁ vā tadatthāya samādapeyya yaṁ paresaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
mn95:18.9_0: Tathārūpo kho panimassāyasmato kāyasamācāro tathārūpo vacīsamācāro yathā taṁ aduṭṭhassa.
mn95:18.10_0: Yaṁ kho pana ayamāyasmā dhammaṁ deseti,
mn95:18.10_1: gambhīro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo;
mn95:19.1_0: Yato naṁ samannesamāno visuddhaṁ dosanīyehi dhammehi samanupassati,
mn95:19.1_1: tato naṁ uttari samannesati mohanīyesu dhammesu.
mn95:19.2_0: Atthi nu kho imassāyasmato tathārūpā mohanīyā dhammā yathārūpehi mohanīyehi dhammehi pariyādinnacitto ajānaṁ vā vadeyya—
mn95:19.4_0: passāmīti, paraṁ vā tadatthāya samādapeyya yaṁ paresaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāyāti?
mn95:19.6_0: ‘natthi kho imassāyasmato tathārūpā mohanīyā dhammā yathārūpehi mohanīyehi dhammehi pariyādinnacitto ajānaṁ vā vadeyya—
mn95:19.8_0: passāmīti, paraṁ vā tadatthāya samādapeyya yaṁ paresaṁ assa dīgharattaṁ ahitāya dukkhāya.
mn95:19.9_0: Tathārūpo kho panimassāyasmato kāyasamācāro tathārūpo vacīsamācāro yathā taṁ amūḷhassa.
mn95:19.10_0: Yaṁ kho pana ayamāyasmā dhammaṁ deseti,
mn95:19.10_1: gambhīro so dhammo duddaso duranubodho santo paṇīto atakkāvacaro nipuṇo paṇḍitavedanīyo;
mn95:20.1_0: Yato naṁ samannesamāno visuddhaṁ mohanīyehi dhammehi samanupassati;
mn95:20.2_12: pahitatto samāno kāyena ceva paramasaccaṁ sacchikaroti paññāya ca naṁ ativijjha passati.
mn95:21.2_0: Kittāvatā pana, bho gotama, saccānuppatti hoti, kittāvatā saccamanupāpuṇāti?
mn95:21.4_0: “Tesaṁyeva, bhāradvāja, dhammānaṁ āsevanā bhāvanā bahulīkammaṁ saccānuppatti hoti.
mn95:22.2_0: Saccānuppattiyā pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:22.3_0: Saccānuppattiyā bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:22.6_0: Yasmā ca kho padahati tasmā saccamanupāpuṇāti.
mn95:23.1_0: “Padhānassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:23.2_0: Padhānassa bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:23.5_0: Yasmā ca kho tuleti tasmā padahati.
mn95:24.1_0: “Tulanāya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:24.2_0: Tulanāya bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:24.5_0: Yasmā ca kho ussahati tasmā tuleti.
mn95:25.1_0: “Ussāhassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:25.2_0: Ussāhassa bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:25.4_0: No cetaṁ chando jāyetha, nayidaṁ ussaheyya.
mn95:25.5_0: Yasmā ca kho chando jāyati tasmā ussahati.
mn95:26.1_0: “Chandassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:26.2_0: Chandassa bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:26.4_0: No cete dhammā nijjhānaṁ khameyyuṁ, nayidaṁ chando jāyetha.
mn95:26.5_0: Yasmā ca kho dhammā nijjhānaṁ khamanti tasmā chando jāyati.
mn95:27.1_0: “Dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:27.2_0: Dhammanijjhānakkhantiyā bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:27.4_0: No cetaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkheyya, nayidaṁ dhammā nijjhānaṁ khameyyuṁ.
mn95:27.5_0: Yasmā ca kho atthaṁ upaparikkhati tasmā dhammā nijjhānaṁ khamanti.
mn95:28.1_0: “Atthūpaparikkhāya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:28.2_0: Atthūpaparikkhāya bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:28.4_0: No cetaṁ dhammaṁ dhāreyya, nayidaṁ atthaṁ upaparikkheyya.
mn95:28.5_0: Yasmā ca kho dhammaṁ dhāreti tasmā atthaṁ upaparikkhati.
mn95:29.1_0: “Dhammadhāraṇāya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:29.2_0: Dhammadhāraṇāya bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:29.4_0: No cetaṁ dhammaṁ suṇeyya, nayidaṁ dhammaṁ dhāreyya.
mn95:29.5_0: Yasmā ca kho dhammaṁ suṇāti tasmā dhammaṁ dhāreti.
mn95:30.1_0: “Dhammassavanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:30.2_0: Dhammassavanassa bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:30.4_0: No cetaṁ sotaṁ odaheyya, nayidaṁ dhammaṁ suṇeyya.
mn95:30.5_0: Yasmā ca kho sotaṁ odahati tasmā dhammaṁ suṇāti.
mn95:31.1_0: “Sotāvadhānassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:31.2_0: Sotāvadhānassa bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:31.4_0: No cetaṁ payirupāseyya, nayidaṁ sotaṁ odaheyya.
mn95:31.5_0: Yasmā ca kho payirupāsati tasmā sotaṁ odahati.
mn95:32.1_0: “Payirupāsanāya pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:32.2_0: Payirupāsanāya bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:32.5_0: Yasmā ca kho upasaṅkamati tasmā payirupāsati.
mn95:33.1_0: “Upasaṅkamanassa pana, bho gotama, katamo dhammo bahukāro?
mn95:33.2_0: Upasaṅkamanassa bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ pucchāmā”ti.
mn95:33.4_0: No cetaṁ saddhā jāyetha, nayidaṁ upasaṅkameyya.
mn95:33.5_0: Yasmā ca kho saddhā jāyati tasmā upasaṅkamati.
mn95:34.1_0: “Saccānurakkhaṇaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ apucchimha, saccānurakkhaṇaṁ bhavaṁ gotamo byākāsi;
mn95:34.2_0: tañca panamhākaṁ ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanā.
mn95:34.3_0: Saccānubodhaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ apucchimha, saccānubodhaṁ bhavaṁ gotamo byākāsi;
mn95:34.4_0: tañca panamhākaṁ ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanā.
mn95:34.5_0: Saccānuppattiṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ apucchimha, saccānuppattiṁ bhavaṁ gotamo byākāsi;
mn95:34.6_0: tañca panamhākaṁ ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanā.
mn95:34.7_0: Saccānuppattiyā bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ apucchimha,
mn95:34.7_1: saccānuppattiyā bahukāraṁ dhammaṁ bhavaṁ gotamo byākāsi;
mn95:34.8_0: tañca panamhākaṁ ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanā.
mn95:34.9_0: Yaṁyadeva ca mayaṁ bhavantaṁ gotamaṁ apucchimha taṁtadeva bhavaṁ gotamo byākāsi;
mn95:34.10_0: tañca panamhākaṁ ruccati ceva khamati ca tena camha attamanā.
mn95:34.11_0: Mayañhi, bho gotama, pubbe evaṁ jānāma:
mn95:34.12_0: ‘ke ca muṇḍakā samaṇakā ibbhā kaṇhā bandhupādāpaccā, ke ca dhammassa aññātāro’ti?
mn95:34.13_0: Ajanesi vata me bhavaṁ gotamo samaṇesu samaṇapemaṁ, samaṇesu samaṇapasādaṁ, samaṇesu samaṇagāravaṁ.
mn95:35.2_0: upāsakaṁ maṁ bhavaṁ gotamo dhāretu ajjatagge pāṇupetaṁ saraṇaṁ gatan”ti.
